name: Spellhound
description: The Spellhound is a large creature with a strong build and a keen sense of smell, particularly attuned to detecting spellcasters.
memorable: It can disrupt magical effects with its powerful howl and is especially lethal against magic users.
goals: To hunt down and incapacitate spellcasters.
relations: Often found in the company of other creatures that threaten magic, may serve a master who uses magic.
environment: Can typically be found in areas where magic is prevalent, such as near magical academies or enchanted forests.
strengths: Possesses high physical attack potential and several abilities to detect and disrupt spellcasting.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its tactical options and problem-solving abilities.
attacks: Uses multiattack to make two bite attacks that deal piercing damage and can knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Nullifying Howl can end spells and stun spellcasters in its vicinity, rendering them vulnerable.
senses: Has keen hearing and smell, granting it advantage on perception checks based on these senses.
skills: Skilled in stealth, allowing it to ambush effectively.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against spells
test_queries: large beast with keen senses and howl
monster that targets spellcasters with howl
creature skilled in ambushing magical foes
